Type Parameters:

public class EnvironmentRenderer<S,E>
extends AbstractRenderer

Subclass of the AbstractRenderer providing the rendering of an environment.

Author:
marcell

Field Detail

environment

private  environment
The environment that should be rendered.

bracketSize

private int bracketSize
The width of the brackets around the environment in pixels.

collapsed

private boolean collapsed
Holds informatioin whether the environment is collapsed.

Only the first element of the environment is show. If there are more than one element, they will only be shown as ", ...". Than the collapsed flag is true else it is false.

collapsedArea

private Rectangle collapsedArea
The rectangle describing the area of the ", ...".

Can be used to determin where a ToolTip should be displayed.

collapsedString

private String collapsedString
Containing all the informations that are not shown. When the environment is collpased.

collapsString

private static final String collapsString

renderer

public void renderer(int x,
                     int y,
                     int width,
                     int height,
                     Graphics gc)
Renders the environment.

The environment is always rendered as a single line. It will appear verticaly centered betwean y and (y + height>.

Parameters:
x - The left position where the environment should be displayed
y - The top position where the environment should be displayed.
width - The width the renderer is given to render the environment.
height - The Height the renderer is given to render the envionment.
gc -
